archimate:BusinessObject.name: BandwidthService
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This class represents a generic specification for defining the characteristics of a Bandwidth Service. Such a Service could be part of a ResourceFacingService. For example, a Provider might have a 150M pipe that is being allocated to multiple customers, where each Customer gets a prescribed amount of bandwidth. This class is the base class for representing such features.
Please see the DEN-ng Service model for more details.
